lego: What are you going to do
practice_phrases: What are you going to do?
你打算做什么？
What are you going to do next?
你打算接下来做什么？
What are you going to do later?
你打算晚点做什么？
What are you going to do next year?
你打算明年做什么？
What are you going to do to help?
你打算做什么来帮忙？
What are you going to do to help me?
你打算做什么来帮我？
What are you going to do if I can't come?
如果我不能来，你打算做什么？
What are you going to do when you see her?
当你见到她时，你打算做什么？
What are you going to do to help me look for it?
你打算做什么来帮我找它？
What are you going to do if you don't have time?
如果你没有时间，你打算做什么？

seed_context.known: What are you going to do on Sunday afternoon?
seed_context.target: 你星期天下午打算做什么？

current_seed_legos_available: What are you going to do
practice_phrases: What are you going to do?
你打算做什么？
You're going to do what?
你打算做什么？
What are you going to do then?
那你打算做什么？
I'll ask him what he's going to do.
我会问他他打算做什么。
Tell me what you're going to do.
告诉我你打算做什么。
I want to know what you're going to do.
我想知道你打算做什么。
Can you understand what I'm going to do?
你能理解我打算做什么吗？
I'll ask her what she's going to do next year.
我会问她她打算明年做什么。
Do you want me to tell you what I'm going to do?
你想让我告诉你我打算做什么吗？
I don't know what you're going to do if you don't have time.
我不知道如果你没有时间你打算做什么。

seed_context.known: What are you going to do on Sunday afternoon?
seed_context.target: 你星期天下午打算做什么？

星期天下午。
I'll come Sunday afternoon.
我星期天下午来。

你星期天下午打算做什么？

我星期天下午见你。
I can help you Sunday afternoon.
我星期天下午可以帮你。
I'll be able to come Sunday afternoon.
我星期天下午就能来。
I want to see you Sunday afternoon if you have time.
如果你有时间，我想星期天下午见你。

我会问她她星期天下午能不能帮忙。

你星期天下午见到他之后打算做什么？

我星期天下午没有时间，虽然我想见你。
